articles.description: England will be chasing history against India at The Oval on Sunday but they are only faced with that challenge after backing themselves into a corner, says chief cricket reporter Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: England vs India: 'Hosts chasing history in fifth Test after backing themselves into a corner'

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says he was "just useless" after qualifying 12th for the Hungarian Grand Prix while his Ferrari team-mate Charles Leclerc took pole position.
articles.title: Hungarian Grand Prix: Lewis Hamilton says 'I'm just useless'

articles.description: Manchester United are prepared to sell Denmark striker Rasmus Hojlund for £30m.
articles.title: Rasmus Hojlund: Manchester United striker available for £30m

articles.description: The British and Irish Lions had a chance to make history but failed to take it against an Australia side inspired by the colossal Will Skelton.
articles.title: Australia 22-12 British and Irish Lions: Andy Farrell's side experience 'a strange kind of glory'

articles.description: Russell Martin has managed just 270 minutes of football as Rangers head coach, and already he has left his players without a name.
articles.title: Rangers: Russell Martin criticises mentality, egos & effort in draw

articles.description: Charley Hull's six-under 66 puts her three shots behind leader Miyu Yamashita heading into the final round of the Women's Open.
articles.title: Women's Open 2025: Charley Hull three shots off Miyu Yamashita's lead after third round

articles.description: England should consider giving Harry Brook the Test captaincy when Ben Stokes is unavailable, rather than promoting vice-captain Ollie Pope, says Ashes-winning former skipper Michael Vaughan.
articles.title: England should consider Harry Brook as captain when Ben Stokes is out - Michael Vaughan

articles.description: Zharnel Hughes and Amy Hunt claim the 100m titles on the opening day of the UK Athletics Championships in Birmingham.
articles.title: UK Athletics Championships: Zharnel Hughes and Amy Hunt win 100m titles

articles.description: Son Heung-min, who has announced he is leaving Tottenham, will always be "worshipped" by Spurs fans, says club legend Micky Hazard.
articles.title: 'Like being with a rock star' - Son's 10 years at Spurs

articles.description: Transgender pool player Harriet Haynes loses a discrimination claim against one of the sport’s organisers.
articles.title: Transgender pool player Harriet Haynes loses discrimination case
